summary: Ameliorate Life is a WIP mod focused on making Skyrim objects and items more usefull
descriptionHtml:
Ameliorate Life adds a more realistic environment to Skyrim it is still a WIP (work in progress)

Ameliorate Life is a Skyrim mod from how I feel skyrim should feel like.

Feel free to comment and add constructive criticism
This is my first skyrim mod so go easy but please do give constructive criticism

So far all this mod does is improve food so you dont have to waste all that time hunting and find useless food

Features
-Food: increased the cost and increased the health/stamina regenerated
-DovahAh Armor: Heavy armor similar to Dragonborn\'s armor in the E3 trailer, also has enchantments to the armor, In Dragon language DovahAh means Dragon Hunter
 
Future Plans
Having a (P) at the end means an optional download

-Make new armor and weapons 
-Improve existing armor and weapons (P)
-Make enemies tougher depending on your level
-Make enemies more realistic e.g a giant being super big have insane damage but act less intelligent (P)
-Increase the weight of food ✓
-Add a Custom Race
-Add Custom Mobs 
-Add Environmental Effects
-Maybe work with some modders to make great mods

Changelog

0.1: Mod first released 
0.2: Changed values and cost for food and added DovahAh armor
0.3: Fixed minor crafting bugs

Thanks to 
Bethesda Game Studios: http://www.youtube.com/user/BethesdaGameStudios?feature=watch
Best In Slot: http://www.youtube.com/user/ForAdventure?feature=watch
-for modding tuts

-Note
Currently I\'ve broken the Skyrim character creation because of my testing sorry for any inconvenience and i\'m fixing it asap
author: Hatesushi
